languages.text: Суровые карательные рейды, обыски и публичные расправы привели население в приличествующий ужас и побудили раскрыть предателей в своих рядах. Подполье мятежников поспешило покинуть крупные города.

traits.locale_text: Суровые карательные рейды, обыски и публичные расправы привели население в приличествующий ужас и побудили раскрыть предателей в своих рядах. Подполье мятежников поспешило покинуть крупные города.

languages.text: As expected, the brutal punitive raids, searches, and public punishments struck terror into the population and spurred them to unmask the traitors within their ranks. The rebel underground was quickly driven from the major cities.
languages.original_text: Суровые карательные рейды, обыски и публичные расправы привели население в приличествующий ужас и побудили раскрыть предателей в своих рядах. Подполье мятежников поспешило покинуть крупные города.

traits.locale_text: As expected, the brutal punitive raids, searches, and public punishments struck terror into the population and spurred them to unmask the traitors within their ranks. The rebel underground was quickly driven from the major cities.

As expected, the brutal punitive raids, searches, and public punishments struck terror into the population and spurred them to unmask the traitors within their ranks. The rebel underground was quickly driven from the major cities.

As expected, the brutal punitive raids, searches, and public punishments struck terror into the population and spurred them to unmask the traitors within their ranks. The rebel underground was quickly driven from the major cities.

As expected, the brutal punitive raids, searches, and public punishments struck terror into the population and spurred them to unmask the traitors within their ranks. The rebel underground was quickly driven from the major cities.

languages.text: 予想どおり、残酷かつ懲罰的な襲撃、探索、そして公開処刑は住民に恐怖を呼び起こし、住民は謀反人の告発に駆り立てられた。反乱者の地下組織は主要都市からたちまち一掃された。
languages.original_text: As expected, the brutal punitive raids, searches, and public punishments struck terror into the population and spurred them to unmask the traitors within their ranks. The rebel underground was quickly driven from the major cities.

traits.locale_text: 予想どおり、残酷かつ懲罰的な襲撃、探索、そして公開処刑は住民に恐怖を呼び起こし、住民は謀反人の告発に駆り立てられた。反乱者の地下組織は主要都市からたちまち一掃された。

languages.text: 不出所料，残酷无情的惩戒性突袭、搜查与公开惩处，让加努斯的民众恐惧不已。他们争相举报身边的叛徒，地下叛军很快被赶出了主要城市。
languages.original_text: As expected, the brutal punitive raids, searches, and public punishments struck terror into the population and spurred them to unmask the traitors within their ranks. The rebel underground was quickly driven from the major cities.

traits.locale_text: 不出所料，残酷无情的惩戒性突袭、搜查与公开惩处，让加努斯的民众恐惧不已。他们争相举报身边的叛徒，地下叛军很快被赶出了主要城市。

languages.text: Tal y como cabía esperar, la brutalidad de las redadas punitivas, registros y castigos ejemplares sembró el pánico entre la población y la incitó a delatar a los traidores que se ocultaban entre ellos. Los rebeldes y su resistencia clandestina fueron expulsados rápidamente de las principales ciudades.
languages.original_text: As expected, the brutal punitive raids, searches, and public punishments struck terror into the population and spurred them to unmask the traitors within their ranks. The rebel underground was quickly driven from the major cities.

traits.locale_text: Tal y como cabía esperar, la brutalidad de las redadas punitivas, registros y castigos ejemplares sembró el pánico entre la población y la incitó a delatar a los traidores que se ocultaban entre ellos. Los rebeldes y su resistencia clandestina fueron expulsados rápidamente de las principales ciudades.

languages.text: Wie erwartet sorgten die brutalen Strafrazzien, Durchsuchungen und öffentlichen Bestrafungen bei der Bevölkerung für Angst und Schrecken und sorgten dafür, dass sie die Verräter in ihren Reihen enttarnte. Der Rebellenuntergrund war schon bald aus den größeren Städten vertrieben.
languages.original_text: As expected, the brutal punitive raids, searches, and public punishments struck terror into the population and spurred them to unmask the traitors within their ranks. The rebel underground was quickly driven from the major cities.

traits.locale_text: Wie erwartet sorgten die brutalen Strafrazzien, Durchsuchungen und öffentlichen Bestrafungen bei der Bevölkerung für Angst und Schrecken und sorgten dafür, dass sie die Verräter in ihren Reihen enttarnte. Der Rebellenuntergrund war schon bald aus den größeren Städten vertrieben.

languages.text: Comme prévu, les descentes punitives brutales, les fouilles et les châtiments publics plongèrent la population dans une terreur totale, poussant les habitants à démasquer les traîtres en leur sein. Le réseau clandestin des rebelles fut rapidement chassé des grandes villes.
languages.original_text: As expected, the brutal punitive raids, searches, and public punishments struck terror into the population and spurred them to unmask the traitors within their ranks. The rebel underground was quickly driven from the major cities.

traits.locale_text: Comme prévu, les descentes punitives brutales, les fouilles et les châtiments publics plongèrent la population dans une terreur totale, poussant les habitants à démasquer les traîtres en leur sein. Le réseau clandestin des rebelles fut rapidement chassé des grandes villes.

languages.text: Zalim cezai baskınlar, aramalar ve halka açık cezalandırmalar; beklendiği gibi halk arasında dehşet uyandırdı ve insanları aralarındaki hainleri açığa çıkarmaya teşvik etti. İsyancı örgütler, hızla büyük şehirlerden sürüldü.
languages.original_text: As expected, the brutal punitive raids, searches, and public punishments struck terror into the population and spurred them to unmask the traitors within their ranks. The rebel underground was quickly driven from the major cities.

traits.locale_text: Zalim cezai baskınlar, aramalar ve halka açık cezalandırmalar; beklendiği gibi halk arasında dehşet uyandırdı ve insanları aralarındaki hainleri açığa çıkarmaya teşvik etti. İsyancı örgütler, hızla büyük şehirlerden sürüldü.
